00069 #define USER_PAGE    0x0FE00000UL /* Address to flash memory */
00070 
00072 /**************************************************************************/
00079 __STATIC_INLINE void BSP_TraceProfilerEnable(bool enable)
00080 {
00081   uint32_t          data;
00082   volatile uint32_t *userpage = (uint32_t *) USER_PAGE;
00083 
00084   /* Check that configuration needs to change */
00085   data = *userpage;
00086   if (enable)
00087   {
00088     if (data == 0xFFFFFFFF)
00089     {
00090       return;
00091     }
00092   }
00093   else
00094   {
00095     if (data == 0x00000000)
00096     {
00097       return;
00098     }
00099   }
00100 
00101   /* Initialize MSC */
00102   MSC_Init();
00103 
00104   /* Write enable or disable trigger word into flash */
00105   if (enable)
00106   {
00107     data = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00108     MSC_ErasePage((uint32_t *) USER_PAGE);
00109     MSC_WriteWord((uint32_t *) USER_PAGE, (void *) &data, 4);
00110   }
00111   else
00112   {
00113     data = 0x00000000;
00114     MSC_ErasePage((uint32_t *) USER_PAGE);
00115     MSC_WriteWord((uint32_t *) USER_PAGE, (void *) &data, 4);
00116   }
00117 }
00118 
00119 #ifdef __cplusplus
00120 }
00121 #endif
00122 
00126 #endif  /* (defined(BSP_ETM_TRACE) && defined( ETM_PRESENT )) || defined( GPIO_ROUTE_SWOPEN ) */
00127 #endif  /* __BSP_TRACE_H */
